name: John Frieda ULTRAfiller+ Thickening Conditioner, Strengthening Conditioner for Damaged or Thin Hair, Infused with Biotin and Hyaluronic Acid to Strengthen Hair for Thicker Fuller Results, 8.3 Oz
short_description: HAIR THICKENING CONDITIONER - Our thickening conditioner gets you 200% thicker*, fuller hair (*vs a basic shampoo) instantly
SPECIAL TECHNOLOGY - This technology aligns and creates spaces between hair fibers as you condition, giving you hair that looks and feels thicker
EXPERT FORMULATED CONDITIONER - This thickening conditioner is infused with biotin and hyaluronic acid and visibly plumps, leaving you with thicker, more full and more nourished hair in just one use
TRUSTWORTHY INGREDIENTS - Our is a silicone-free and vegan volume conditioner
MORE THAN CONDITIONER - Try the power of the whole John Frieda ULTRAfiller+ line–together, all three products (thickening shampoo, conditioner and spray) get you optimal results
product_description: Instantly get the look and feel of more hair. Infused with biotin and hyaluronic acid, this thickening conditioner visibly plumps, leaving you with thicker, fuller and more nourished hair in only one use! Our hair volume conditioner plumps the overall thickness of your hair by 200%* and nourishes your hair, reducing hair loss due to breakage (*when using ULTRAfiller+ Shampoo, Conditioner & Spray vs. basic shampoo). Our John Frieda ULTRAfiller+ technology strengthens your hair, adding manageability to fine, fragile hair while boosting overall hair thickness and plumpness. How? It aligns and creates spaces between hair fibers, resulting in a thicker look and feel. Give fine, flat hair an instant thickening boost with this silicone-free and vegan friendly volumizing conditioner. To use, work our volumizing shampoo gently through wet hair, lather and rinse well. Try the full John Frieda PROfiller+ thickening line, which is a 3-step process. Together, all three products complement each other for the best thickening results. Step 1 is to cleanse with our thickening shampoo that visually plumps in only one use. Step 2 is to strengthen as you condition, helping to align the hair and creating thickness with our John Frieda ULTRAfiller+ conditioner for thinning hair. Step 3 is to thicken with our thickening spray, which plumps all over and provides heat protection for fragile hair. Try them all today for thicker, bouncier, more resilient hair.

name: OGX Biotin & Collagen Extra Strength Volumizing Conditioner for Thicker, Fuller Hair, 25.4 fl oz
short_description: EXTRA VOLUME: Get an extra helping of vitamins and proteins to pump up fine hair with OGX Extra Strength Biotin & Collagen Conditioner
NATURALLY NOURISHING: Infused with Biotin, or vitamin B7, plus collagen, this volumizing conditioner helps nourish hair for a full, healthy look
HEALTHY GROWTH: The formula also includes wheat protein, which helps maintain growth for hair that's healthy-looking and feels thicker
LIGHTWEIGHT CLEANSING: While it delivers extra nourishment, it’s also an astonishingly lightweight blend that delivers deep clean, bold body, and incredible volume
PURE & SIMPLE: Paraben-free and gentle, with sulfate-free surfactants, for naturally nourished hair
product_description: Add extra volume and nourishment to your hair with OGX Extra Strength Biotin & Collagen Conditioner. This volumizing conditioner pumps up flat strands without adding extra weight. Infused with Biotin, or vitamin B7, plus collagen, this extra strength formula helps nourish hair for a full, healthy look. The luscious blend in this volumizing conditioner also contains hydrolyzed wheat proteins for hair that feels thicker and healthy-looking. Plus, the bergamot, jasmine and vanilla scent makes lathering up an all-around sensory experience that leaves your locks with an irresistibly good smell. It's also an astonishingly lightweight blend that delivers deep clean, bold body and incredible volume, and is safe for chemically treated hair. Our formula promotes healthier-looking hair, which allows you and your hair to keep shining on. Paraben-free with sulfate-free surfactants, this volumizing conditioner represents beauty, pure and simple. To use, apply after shampooing to wet hair, massage through to ends, then rinse hair thoroughly. Start with OGX Extra Strength Biotin & Collagen Shampoo for the optimal volumizing hair care routine.

name: JVN Embody Volumizing Conditioner, 10 Fl Oz, Thickening Conditioner for Fine or Thin Hair, Adds Fullness, Moisture and Restores Shine, Hair Care for Women and Men, Non-Toxic, Silicone and Paraben Free
short_description: BOUNCY, BEAUTIFUL HAIR: Volumize and boost hair fullness with our invigorating Embody Conditioner that adds body and shine.
THICKER LOCKS: Add volume to thin or fine hair without drying it out. Our formulation features light hydration, which won't weigh hair down.
MADE WITH EFFECTIVE INGREDIENTS: Our Embody Volumizing Conditioner is made with Biotin to stimulate keratin production and improve hair thickness while Bamboo Extract adds volume and healthy shine.

HOW TO USE: Apply to freshly shampooed mid-lengths and ends, adding more if you need it so no strands are left behind! Rinse. JVN TIP: Have longer or thicker locks? Comb gently with a wide toothed comb after applying to ensure even distribution, which leads to maximum silky softness.
WE LOVE THE HAIR YOU HAVE: Whether you’re embracing your natural texture or changing it completely, JVN empowers you to celebrate your beauty with the products that make it effortless.

name: OGX Thick & Full + Biotin and Collagen for Hair Volume & Body, Sulfate Free Volumizing Shampoo & Conditioner Set for Fine & Thinning Hair, Nutrient-Infused, Vitamin B7, 13 fl oz, 2 Pack
short_description: Biotin shampoo and conditioner set: Volumizing formula with biotin and collagen boosts fullness and body for flat to medium hair; sulfate free shampoo and paraben free conditioner for gentle, daily use and healthy-looking shine.

Sulfate free shampoo for color safe care: Gentle surfactants cleanse without stripping, making this color safe shampoo and conditioner ideal for dyed or treated hair; preserves vibrancy with nutrient-rich ingredients.

Moisturizing shampoo and conditioner: Plump-it-up formula hydrates and detangles each strand, reducing breakage and boosting manageability; enriched with biotin, and collagen for stronger, thicker-feeling hair with improved softness.

Helps maintain healthy-looking hair: Biotin, collagen and wheat protein nourish roots and strengthen hair from within; volumizing blend helps maintain fuller, thicker-looking locks while protecting against dryness.

Simple routine and delightful scent: Apply shampoo generously to wet hair, lather and rinse; follow with conditioner for best results; bergamot, jasmine and vanilla fragrance leaves hair clean, fresh and irresistibly scented.
product_description: OGX Thick & Full + Biotin & Collagen Volumizing Shampoo and Conditioner Set is a sulfate free shampoo and conditioner duo expertly formulated to help plump, thicken, and add body to fine, flat, or thinning hair, making it ideal for those seeking fuller, more abundant-looking locks. This nutrient-infused set features vitamin B7 biotin, collagen, positioning it among the top hair thickening products for women and men. The hydrating, paraben-free formula with sulfate-free surfactants is gentle on the scalp and suitable for a wide range of hair types including fine, dry, oily, frizzy, and thinning hair, ensuring versatility for diverse hair care needs. Each wash delivers a signature bergamot, jasmine, and vanilla scent, transforming your hair care routine into a sensory experience that leaves hair with a fresh, irresistible fragrance. For best results, apply the shampoo generously to wet hair, massage into a rich lather, and rinse thoroughly, then follow with the conditioner to help enhance volume and body without weighing hair down. This biotin shampoo and conditioner set is part of the OGX collection of volumizing hair products and pairs well with OGX Biotin & Collagen hair hydration treatments to infuse nutrients into every strand, supporting the appearance of thicker, fuller hair over time. Designed for those looking for a sulfate free shampoo and conditioner that addresses the needs of thinning hair, this set is also suitable as a shampoo and conditioner for women and men who want to achieve healthy, voluminous results. Whether your hair is fine, thinning, or frizzy, OGX Thick & Full + Biotin & Collagen provides a gentle, effective solution for daily hair care, helping you enjoy hair that looks and feels more robust, vibrant, and full of life.

product_description: Elvive Hyaluron + Plump paraben-free hydrating formulas help achieve shinier, free-flowing strands for dry, dehydrated hair without weigh down. Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid, Elvive Hyaluron + Plump regimen, inspired by skincare, helps hair fibers retain long-lasting moisture. Hydrating Shampoo gently cleanses and instantly hydrates while the Hydrating Conditioner instantly detangles and moisturizes dry hair. The Wonder Water provides flash hydration for soft, weightless hair, and the replumping serum, with 2 percent Hyaluronic Care Complex, serves as a daily moisturizing leave-in, giving a full boost of moisture to dry hair and leaving hair bouncier and shinier.
